--- title: "Tips & Tricks" --- - Use Keyboard Shortcuts to speed your coding (see [-@sec-keyboard-shortcuts]) ## Keyboard Shortcuts {#sec-keyboard-shortcuts} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Execute Windows Mac
Run code ในบรรทัดที่ cursur วางอยู่ หรือใน selection Ctrl+Enter Cmd+Enter
Source file (run code ทั้ง file) Ctrl+Shift+Enter Cmd+Shift+Enter
Knit R Markdown Ctrl+Shift+K Cmd+Shift+K
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Editing Windows Mac
Insert section label Ctrl+Shift+R Cmd+Shift+R
Insert R Markdown Code Chunk Ctrl+Alt+I Cmd+Option+I
````` ::: ::: **References:** - [Keyboard Shortcuts in RStudio](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200711853-Keyboard-Shortcuts) ## CheatSheet
